availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Job M. Reamer (Louisville, Kentucky, clerk and bookkeeper)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, clerk and bookkeeper. Pennsylvania native. Son of James Reamer and Sarah E. Reamer. Resident of Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, in 1850. Clerk in Louisville, Kentucky, in 1861. Bookkeeper in Louisville in 1865.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Pennsylvania, Alleghany County, Pittsburgh, District 2, p. 80B.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, District 6, p. 629A.
